title: About this Site
text:
I am a determined and strong-willed individual. I pride myself in always doing my best and taking the next step forward.
I focus on the concepts of sustainability and environmental conservation. It is important for humans and nature to live in harmony while maintain everyone’s health and well-being!

title: My Projects
text:
In Spring of 2025 I took a Quantitative Reasoning class.

In this assignment, I learned how to build my own user site using GitHub
It includes my Github repository with access to all of my code for the project
I included images of me, paragraphs about me, as well as my projects.
It also includes my professional information like my LinkedIn and my resume
I learned how to overcome issues and recognize where my errors occurred while building this website

title: Sierra Mattair
text: Hi!! My name is Sierra Mattair and this is my first website! I’m majoring in Ecosystem Science and Sustainability at Colorado State University. I love being outside and being in nature. I enjoy the deep forest, bodies of water, hikes, and road trips. I love learning new things and expanding my knowledge! Enjoy exploring my site!
